Welcome to the website for the 2025 Smithsonian NMNH MitoPilot workshop!

Our schedule for today:

**9 AM – 12 PM:** Introduction to mitogenomes and MitoPilot, cluster computing basics, MitoPilot installation, running a test project
**12 PM – 1 PM:** lunch break
**1 PM – 3 PM:** Finishing the test project, inspecting results, manual curation, export
**3 PM – 3:30 PM:** break
**3:30 PM – 5 PM:** How to set up your own project, custom assembly and annotation databases, wrap-up
